scriptie-talkie-embed blog post example

source of this example

Use it to demonstrate interesting aspects of JavaScript, i.e. Object.freeze

By default the size will be determined to make the terminal (on the right side) fit as much of its contents as possible

However you may also size it to just fit the editor on the left by setting the data-scriptie-talkie attribute to { sizeToEditor: true }. Readers can scroll the terminal up and down with the mouse and edit the code to experiment with it.
